column1: Extension of this analysis to primary tumors and the normal cerebellum revealed three major classes of epigenetically regulated genes: ( 1) normally methylated genes ( DAZL, ZNF157, ASN) whose methylation reflects somatic patterns observed in the cerebellum, ( 2) X - linked genes ( MSN, POU3F4, HTR2C) that show disruption of their sex - specific methylation patterns in tumors, and ( 3) tumor - specific methylated genes ( COL1A2, S100A10, S100A6, HTATIP2, CDH1, LXN) that display enhanced methylation levels in tumors compared with the cerebellum.
